title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Boil a large pot of salted water and cook spaghetti until al dente.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together in a small bowl.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta, remove from heat, and quickly stir in egg mixture.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A rich, gooey chocolate dessert that melts in your mouth.
instructions: Whisk eggs and sugar, then fold in chocolate and flour.
Pour into ramekins and bake for 12 minutes.
